channel.title: [508] How do i increase how much xp someone will get when attacking a monster?
channel.description:
How do i increase how much xp someone will get when attacking a monster? - i have where it'd take about 6 hours to get a 99.... and i wanted to make it so theyd get it faster, how do i do this?
Shank You
